testCases.explanation: Non-negative elements are [3,2,1]. After rotating right by 1: [1,3,2]. The first non-negative element in original order is now 1, but return count of non-negatives rotated = 3
All elements are non-negative, all 4 are rotated
No non-negative elements, nothing to rotate

description: Given an array `nums`, rotate the non-negative elements among them (in-place among their positions) and return the count of non-negative elements.

examples.explanation: Non-negative elements are [3,2,1], they are rotated among their positions.
